ST.xhtml: (*Calculate if these two rectangles are overlapping*) IF R1_X < (R2_X + R2_W) AND (R1_X + R1_W) > R2_X AND R1_Y < (R2_Y + R2_H) AND (R1_H + R1_Y) > R2_Y THEN checkOverlapRectangle := TRUE; ELSE checkOverlapRectangle := FALSE; END_IF
